hero.title: Frontend developer creating convenient and lively interfaces

about.title: About me
about.description: My name is Stanislav. I'm a frontend developer with over 5 years of commercial experience, specializing in creating web interfaces using React, TypeScript and Redux.
about.experience: Participated in the development of large ERP, B2B and analytical systems, including projects for restaurant business, metallurgy and government institutions. Worked both in teams and independently.
about.principles: I follow clean code principles, pay attention to UX and interface performance. I use FSD, responsive design, modern UI libraries and library architecture.
about.teaching: I also have experience teaching and mentoring junior developers.

footer.developed: This site was developed by me
